mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bbsm_reply WHERE boardNo=#{boardNo} ORDER BY replyNo ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbsm_reply(replyNo, boardNo, replyContent, replyer) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{replyContent}, #{replyer})
